description: This form appends the following scientific domain into the permitted CMIP7 Controlled Vocabularies list.\n\nThe permitted set of values are defined in the [WCRP constants repo](https://wcrp-cmip.github.io/WCRP-constants/scientific_domain/). If your item is missing please [register here first](https://github.com/WCRP-CMIP/WCRP-constants/issues/new?template=scientific_domain.yml) and wait a day after it has been confirmed for this script to be remade.

label: Scientific Domain
description: Select the scientific domains to add to CMIP7

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
